short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HighVocab vocabulary builder: Save words and phrases, highlight while browsing, rephrase sentences, play flashcards and quizzes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Are you struggling to memorize new vocabulary and phrases you've just translated? Or do you love reading and want to learn new words and phrases? 📚

You're in the right spot! HighVocab changes the way you save, manage, learn, and rephrase sentences. Key features include:

🔥 Personalized Vocabulary & Phrase Lists
HighVocab lets you create customized word and phrase lists based on your interests while browsing the web, making learning more fun and enjoyable.

💡 Real-Time Word Highlights
HighVocab intelligently highlights your saved vocabulary while you surf the internet. Simply hover over the highlighted words for instant access to detailed information, boosting your learning experience.

✅ One-Click Vocabulary Addition
Just select any word you want to learn as you browse, and HighVocab's pop-up will suggest the best definition and example before adding it to your vocabulary list.

🌐 Instant Translation
With HighVocab, you can instantly translate any word to your preferred language, making it easier than ever to understand and learn.

📝 Vocabulary Quizzes
Test your knowledge and reinforce your learning with interactive vocabulary quizzes tailored to your saved words.

🔔 Word of the Day Notification
Get daily reminders to review and memorize words from your list, ensuring steady progress in your language learning journey!

🖼️ Image-Enhanced Vocabulary
View relevant images with your vocabulary words for a more engaging and memorable learning experience!

🎴 Master Phrases with Flashcards
Save your favorite phrases and practice them easily using HighVocab Flashcards.

🔄 Sentence Rephrasing
HighVocab's AI technology can rephrase your sentences to enhance clarity, improve fluency, and add variety to your writing style. Just type or paste your sentence, and our AI will provide you with polished alternatives.

📊 Personalized Dashboard
Keep track of your progress with a personalized dashboard that adapts to your learning pace and style, ensuring a tailored learning experience.

📤 Exporting Functionality
Easily transfer your data in CSV format for convenience and flexibility.

Elevate your language skills today with HighVocab - the smart, efficient, and enjoyable Chrome extension for mastering English vocabulary and phrases in no time. Download now and start your journey to linguistic excellence!
